headline: MSCI CEO: AI Boom Echoes Railroads, Dot-Com Frenzy
summary: Henry Fernandez, the Chairman and CEO of MSCI says today's surge in AI and tech investment echoes past revolutions from the railroads to the dot-com boom. Not every play will pay off, but the shakeout will reveal the real winners and the costly missteps. He joined Bloomberg Open Interest to talk about the trend, as well as the push for transparency in private markets.
